sen.e: FUJIWARA no Tadanobu (967 to May 9, 1035) was a Kugyo (the top court officials) who lived during the mid Heian period.

sen.j: 政治能力に欠ける同母兄の藤原誠信とは反対に、若年時より切れ者の能吏として頭角を現した。
sen.e: Unlike his elder brother-uterine, FUJIWARA no Sanenobu, who lacked the competence as a politician, he distinguished himself as a competent politician since he was young.
